meanings.definition: A Spanish form of musical theater combining operatic and popular elements.
meanings.sent1: We watched a zarzuelas performance at the theater last night.
meanings.sent2: The zarzuelas we saw featured beautiful singing and lively dancing.
meanings.sent3: The audience clapped and cheered during the zarzuelas, clearly enjoying the show.
meanings.sent4: The zarzuelas transported me to a world of music and drama.
meanings.sent5: The colorful costumes and vibrant music made the zarzuelas unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Plural form of zarzuela, referring to multiple instances of the musical theater genre.
meanings.sent1: In Spain, you can find zarzuelas in many theaters across the country.
meanings.sent2: The festival showcased various zarzuelas from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to watch back-to-back zarzuelas for a fun night out.
meanings.sent4: The zarzuelas lined up one after another, creating a musical extravaganza.
meanings.sent5: Attending multiple zarzuelas in a row was a delightful experience for the audience.
